Class Fraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • lord.of.rome.DrawableObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Moveable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarbarianHorde, RomanLegion

    public abstract class Fraction
extends Creature
    Class that simulates concept of fraction, armed version of creature which is able to fight.
    Author:
    Carlos

    Serialized Form
